PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-06332000-05-040,  ,  ,  FIN, 
PrecisRegulations Amending the INPUT TAX CREDIT INFORMATION REGULATIONS by allowing an invoice or receipt issued by an agent or other intermediary to be used to substantiate a claim for an input tax credit, introducing a requirement to indicate the tax rate that applies to purchases where the taxes are included in the price of the goods, and by revising the Short Title to make reference to the Harmonized Sales Tax.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2000-0180 Publication Date: 2000-05-24
Attachments
